messages.message: :lolcry: I spent a couple mins looking for this thread cause the issue occurred again. After running the commands, the build process for all the services were unblocked

Yeah, wondering if the hourly refresh is enough. I think that when a sandbox starts up from sleep, if you get unlucky, it could be 59 minutes before the script runs.

I don't think crafting has a way to run a script when the sandbox boots though :confused: but maybe I can hack it somehow. How long was had your sandbox been running when you ran into this?
I'm not sure how to check but I wonder if we can leverage certain commands like `cs restart` to pull the gcr/ecr logins
